Sentencas: In this study, we propose a new fabrication technique for a Ni-YSZ (yttria-stabilized zirconia) composite anode widely used in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: New fabrication technique for a Ni-YSZ composite anode from a core-shell structured particle

Sentencas: A spherical core-shell structure consisting of a micron-sized Ni (core) and nano-sized YSZ (shell) was prepared by a high-speed mixing technique from metallic a Ni and YSZ powder mixture.
Titulo: New fabrication technique for a Ni-YSZ composite anode from a core-shell structured particle

Sentencas: The core-shell Ni-YSZ powder was then heat-treated at 1450 degrees C in an air atmosphere.
Titulo: New fabrication technique for a Ni-YSZ composite anode from a core-shell structured particle

Sentencas: During the early stage of the heat-treatment between 300 and 550 degrees C, it seemed that the surface of the Ni core was oxidized and the Ni particles were coated with a relatively dense NiO thin layer.
Titulo: New fabrication technique for a Ni-YSZ composite anode from a core-shell structured particle

Sentencas: As the heat-treatment temperature increased, the Ni core particles erupted, which led to uniformly distributed Ni particles in the YSZ framework.
Titulo: New fabrication technique for a Ni-YSZ composite anode from a core-shell structured particle

Sentencas: The resulting Ni-YSZ composite exhibited better electrical conductivity and ASR for anode polarization than a commercially available Ni-YSZ cermet anode.
Titulo: New fabrication technique for a Ni-YSZ composite anode from a core-shell structured particle
New fabrication technique for a Ni-YSZ composite anode from a core-shell structured particle
New fabrication technique for a Ni-YSZ composite anode from a core-shell structured particle
